problems.title: New 21 Game (Sliding Window)
problems.description:
Alice plays a game where she starts with 0 points and draws numbers while she has less than k points. During each draw, she gains an integer number of points randomly from [1, maxPts]. Return the probability that Alice has n or fewer points. Answers within 10^-5 are considered accepted.

Input Format:
First line: three integers n, k, and maxPts.

Output Format:
Print the probability formatted to 5 decimal places.
hintsList: Think about how to use a sliding window to optimize the solution.
Consider using a frequency map or two pointers to track the window state.
